about: Graduated in the Computer Engineering course, enthusiast for various technologies, I am always looking for ways to improve myself in my area of ​​expertise. I'm open to opportunities that motivate me and solidify my experience as a developer and computer engineer

profissional_exp.comment: Working mainly with the Java language in version 11 and the spring boot framework. Using the microsoft azure cloud platform, having experiences with terraform for observability tools (New Relic). Developing a system according to design standards and SOLID conventions, using TDD and BDD to cover the test pyramid.
Controlling the entire infrastructure, providing all the APIs that manage the schools, using the programming language Java 8, MySQL, AWS Lambda services, SQS, SNS, S3, Aurora, API Gateway.

Developer in the company's R&D area, performing and testing and improving the software that manages the product's hardware, using the Java 8 programming language, embedded in Intel Edison microcontrollers.
